1.0.0-1:
First beta for tvOS.

- Videos tab with TV topics, trending, events.
- Livestreams tab with TV and radio live channels.
- Shows tab with main TV shows.
1.0.0-2:
- Current program display on the livestreams tab.
- Playback can be resumed.
- Standard page view measurements.
1.0.0-3:
- Updated translations for all BUs.
- Add date information in media view.
- "Resume" button instead of "Watch" button if needed.
- Only one tab for Play SWI.
1.0.0-4:
- Redesigned TV show A-Z page.
- Add most popular videos at the top of topic pages.
- Correctly update play button state when playback can be resumed.
- Improve suggestions displayed for SRF at the top of the homepage.
- Add support for web first video display on the homepage.
- Conform to official page view measurement specifications.
